content: Great work.Now we need about 200 words between this story and Jack coming back to the to the musuem on his first day of Chrstimas break, where he will spend all all day at the musuem. (This will be when he will wandered into a storage room and see the mirror for the first time, but DO NOT actually mention the mirror in any of these 200 words. The goal of this writing is to create a transtion between Jack's musuem experience in the fall and coming back at Christmas break!)
